survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with On-Site Wellness Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with current on-site wellness programs and identify areas for improvement to enhance workplace well-being.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current on-site wellness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly design for accessibility.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current on-site wellness programs offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following on-site wellness programs do you currently participate in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select to capture overlapping participation. Consider adding an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: Which of the following on-site wellness programs do you currently participate in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can provide valuable qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is adequately sized.

script.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered at your workplace?

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in on-site wellness programs?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents except those who selected 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to gauge engagement levels. Clear wording is essential.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in on-site wellness programs?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents except those who selected 'None of the above' in Q2

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating more in on-site wellness programs?
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q4
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with an 'Other' option to capture unique barriers. Helps identify actionable improvements.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating more in on-site wellness programs?
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Rarely' or 'Never' in Q4
